summary: Allows you to change the weather.
descriptionHtml:
Did you want control of the weather for all of Skyrim. Well now you can. You can set it to be clear, cloudy, foggy, light rain, heavy rain, light snow, heavy snow and you can reset to default. You may also choose what region type you want (Example: You can have the clear sky that is seen when your in the Reach anywhere in Skyrim). You may also choose to have Northern Lights at night or not to have Northern Lights at night. If your using a rain or snow option it may only do those effect in areas it normally will (Example: It will never rain in Windhelm or Snow in Riften) It will add an item to the players inventory when you start the game and to change the weather just equip the item. If you don't have the Dawnguard DLC download the Weather Control file. If you do have the Dawngurd DLC download the Weather Control (Dawnguard) file. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1010?]here[/url]. Also look at my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75593/?]Dragonborn Weather Control[/url].Â And if you play Oblivion also look at my [url=http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/28951]Oblivion Weather Control[/url]

Requirements
Skyrim
Dawnguard (Weather Control (Dawnguard))

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin, and bsa into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
